pr_title: Transmodel API - Change searchWindow unit minutes not seconds

timeline.message: Transmodel API and code cleanup - For the searchWindow request/response fields use minutes as unit not seconds to be consistent. The REST API is using seconds. Also change the internal model to use type safe Duration.

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/model/routing/TripSearchMetadata.java b/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/model/routing/TripSearchMetadata.java index bc4ce81c1..29916a38e 100644 --- a/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/model/routing/TripSearchMetadata.java +++ b/src/main/java/org/opentripplanner/model/routing/TripSearchMetadata.java @@ -11,8 +11,6 @@ public class TripSearchMetadata { /** * This is the time window used by the raptor search. The window is an optional parameter and * OTP might override it/dynamically assign a new value. - *

- * Unit : seconds */ public Duration searchWindowUsed;
